roleset.name: to utter howling sounds, as in shrill, wordless lamentation

example.name: Lamentation
example.text: Mary ululated all night in the wake of the news of John's death.
example.arg: in the wake of the news of John's death

roleset.note: frame by Perryn. Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls animal_sounds-38, sound_emission-43.2.

example.name: sad robot
example.text: It ululated like a mortally wounded animal, and its probe wires emitted copious amounts of smoke down their entire two-meter lengths.

example.name: with arg1
example.text: He howled a scream, he ululated a scream that overrode the sound of flutes, drum, and chanting.
example.arg: a scream that overrode the sound of flutes, drum and chanting

predicate.note: Frames file for 'ululate' based on dictionary.com.
